summary: This document discusses a potential coup d'etat being planned by Ngo Dinh Nhu against the Diem government in South Vietnam in July 1963. Nhu is reportedly seeking support from army generals and believes a swift, overnight coup is necessary. The document also mentions concerns about the influence of Buddhist leaders and the need for immediate action given the upcoming arrival of a new US ambassador.
title: CIA Information Telegram: Coup D'Etat Plan of Ngo Dinh Nhu
